Talks and Media

Here are some of my talks and presentations.

Presented research for practitioners, academics and the public, including:

  • Biometrics in humanitarian work, Reimagining Digital Humanitarianism, Goldsmiths, London, February 2018
  • Digital Ecosystems of Refugee Mobility, King’s College London, March 2017
  • Six ways to pick better transparency and accountability tech, The Impacts of Civic Tech (TICTec), Barcelona, April 2016
  • Humanitarian Futures for Messaging Apps, International Committee of the Red Cross (Geneva), January 2017
  • How to Counter the Backlash Against Transparency in the Age of Fake News & Data Breaches, International Anti-Corruption Conference, Copenhagen, September 2018

    • Quoted and cited in international media

    .

    Producer on transparency and accountability-focused podcast guest interviewee on the Recompiler podcast

    Presented in webinars for Namati, Open Society Foundations, Funders Initiative on Civil Society.
